post.title: Digest - Week 2023/27
post.body:
ㅤ
### [Bun — A fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime](https://bun.sh/)
Bundle, transpile, install, and run JavaScript & TypeScript — all in Bun. Bun is a new JavaScript runtime with a native bundler, transpiler, task runner, and npm client built-in.
ㅤ
### [A Comprehensive Guide to Building Event-Driven Architecture on Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud](https://www.infoq.com/articles/event-driven-architecture-clouds/)
In this article, you'll find guidance to Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud resources, along with unique architecture examples that incorporate EventBridge, SNS, Service Bus, Eventgrid, and GC Eventarc.
ㅤ
### [Remotion 4.0 | Remotion | Make videos programmatically in React](https://www.remotion.dev/blog/4-0)
Introducing visual editing, Rust-powered architecture, and the Render Button.
ㅤ
### [imgly/background-removal-js: Remove backgrounds from images directly in the browser environment with ease and no additional costs or privacy concerns. Explore an interactive demo.](https://github.com/imgly/background-removal-js)
Remove backgrounds from images directly in the browser environment with ease and no additional costs or privacy concerns. Explore an interactive demo. - imgly/background-removal-js: Remove backgrounds from images directly in the browser environment with ease and no additional costs or privacy concerns. Explore an interactive demo.
ㅤ
### [Salesforce on LinkedIn: 👋 Hello! 今日は Salut! 你好 Hallo! Ciao! Hola! 👋 Interacting with shoppers…](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/salesforce_hello-%E4%BB%8A%E6%97%A5%E3%81%AF-salut-%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD-hallo-ciao-hola-activity-7082319726802071553-NJNW/)
👋 Hello! 今日は Salut! 你好 Hallo! Ciao! Hola! 👋

Interacting with shoppers in their local language is a powerful experience. Yet, many online businesses lack the…
ㅤ
### [obytes/app-icon-badge: 🧩 Expo plugin/library to add badges for your app icon: banner, ribbon, and fully customizable.](https://github.com/obytes/app-icon-badge)
🧩 Expo plugin/library to add badges for your app icon: banner, ribbon, and fully customizable. - obytes/app-icon-badge: 🧩 Expo plugin/library to add badges for your app icon: banner, ribbon, and fully customizable.
ㅤ
### [alin23/Lunar: Intelligent adaptive brightness for your external monitors](https://github.com/alin23/Lunar)
Intelligent adaptive brightness for your external monitors - alin23/Lunar: Intelligent adaptive brightness for your external monitors
ㅤ
### [The case against self-closing tags in HTML - JakeArchibald.com](https://jakearchibald.com/2023/against-self-closing-tags-in-html/)
The history, facts, and opinions.
ㅤ
### [Médédé Raymond KPATCHAA has invited you to try Warp. (Shameless plug 😛 )](https://app.warp.dev/referral/726K3L)
Warp is a modern, Rust-based terminal with AI built in so you and your team can build great software, faster. Now available on MacOS.
post.excerpt: Weekly digest of my readings and interesting topics. Week 27 of 2023.
post.tags: Javascript, Runtime, Event-driven, Remotion, Salesforce B2C Commerce, React Native, Tools, HTML
